title: Change the service name
content:
If you want to change the service name and description from the default values, you can edit these in the designer-wrapper.conf file.

  1. Stop the OO Workflow Designer service.
  2. Navigate to the designer\bin directory. The default is C:\Program Files\Micro Focus\ Operations OrchestrationÂ Designer.
  3. Run uninstall-designer-service.bat.
  4. Verify that the service is uninstalled.
  5. Navigate to the designer\conf directory.

  6. Make a copy of the designer-wrapper.conf file.

    This step is an optional step used for saving the original configuration so that you have a backup if a rollback is required or if the modified file becomes unusable in any way.

  7. Edit the designer-wrapper.conf file, by modifying the following lines to suit your needs:

    wrapper.name
wrapper.displayname
wrapper.description

    For example:

    # Name of the service
wrapper.name=MICROFOCUSOOD_e09831a2-b3d7-4b55-8307-2ce9500ed591
# Display name of the service
wrapper.displayname=Micro Focus Operations Orchestration Designer(@ C:/Program Files/Micro Focus/Operations Orchestration Designer/designer)
# Description of the service
wrapper.description=Micro Focus Operations Orchestration Designer(@ C:/Program Files/Micro Focus/Operations Orchestration Designer/designer)
  8. Run install-designer-as-service.bat.
  9. Verify that the service is installed with the new names and descriptions.
  10. Start the new OO Central service.

Related topic

  • To change the timeout limit for OO Workflow Designer web interface, see Change the timeout limit for the OO Workflow Designer web interface topic.
